question: Which of the following statements is incorrect about Anti-Defection Law?
option1: The provisions for the anti-defection law have been mentioned in the Tenth Schedule of the Constitution
option2: It was added to the constitution via the 52nd amendment act
option3: The Governor of the state has been empowered to decide disqualification on grounds of defection
option4: An independent MP or MLA becomes disqualified if he joins any political party after his election
answer: The Governor of the state has been empowered to decide disqualification on grounds of defection
explanation: Third statement is incorrect because the presiding officer of the House has been empowered to decide disqualification on grounds of defection
